subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Radamel Falcao scored twice, and Atlético Madrid defeated Athletic Bilbao, 3-0, to win an all-Spanish Europa League final Wednesday night in Bucharest, Romania.
snippet: Radamel Falcao scored twice, and Atlético Madrid defeated Athletic Bilbao, 3-0, to win an all-Spanish Europa League final Wednesday night in Bucharest, Romania.
